entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, a young wizard.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, a dark wizard.

entities.name: hepzibah smith
entities.description: A woman who was poisoned by Hokey, a house-elf.

entities.name: hokey
entities.description: A house-elf who was convicted of poisoning Hepzibah Smith's evening cocoa.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry saw Voldemort's momentary red gleam in his eyes.
Hokey was convicted of poisoning Hepzibah Smith's evening cocoa.
Dumbledore led Harry through oblivion and back to his office.
